entity.name: page
entity.query: SELECT page_id AS id, page_title AS title_t, CONVERT(rev_timestamp USING utf8) AS last_update, page_len AS length_i, rev_user_text AS author_s, rev_user_text AS author_t, CONVERT(old_text USING utf8) AS content_t FROM page, revision, text WHERE page.page_id = revision.rev_page AND revision.rev_text_id = text.old_id
